title: 2006 Pilot Pen Tennis – Men's doubles
text:
<a href="Gast%C3%B3n%20Etlis">Gastón Etlis</a> and <a href="Mart%C3%ADn%20Rodr%C3%ADguez%20%28tennis%29">Martín Rodríguez</a> were the defending champions, but did not compete this year.
<a href="Jonathan%20Erlich">Jonathan Erlich</a> and <a href="Andy%20Ram">Andy Ram</a> won the title, defeating <a href="Mariusz%20Fyrstenberg">Mariusz Fyrstenberg</a> and <a href="Marcin%20Matkowski">Marcin Matkowski</a> 6–3, 6–3 in the final. It was the 9th doubles title for both players in their careers.
